Monster.Name: Thug
Monster.Description: Thugs are ruthless enforcers skilled at intimidation and violence. They work for money and have few scruples.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The thug makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Mace
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Heavy Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
